description: Siting of caravan to rear garden, following demolition of existing outbuilding (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to the mobility of the fully assembled unit that confirms that on the balance of probability, the proposal would not fall within the definition of a caravan as set out within the Caravan Sites and Control of Development Act 1960 and Caravan Sites Act 1968 (as amended).

It is also considered that the erection of the caravan would result in 'development' as defined within Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as on the balance of probability, the proposal would involve the creation of  building which is capable of use as a self contained independent dwelling, resulting in a material change of the sites use.
